biotools.summary:
A web-based colocalization tool for the annotation and functional follow-up of GWAS.

Explore GWAS Results with GTEx's eQTL Association Results.

A Colocalization Tool to Prioritize Genes and Tissues from GWAS and eQTL Integration.
